entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:47 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
